name: Lunattack
description:
Lunattack (for mobile use: https://captain-mingo.github.io/lunattack)

Simple VR game: Rockets are launching up to splode the moon. You have the power to lazer them down. Do it! Save the Moon!

For phone: Use this URL: https://captain-mingo.github.io/lunattack (itch.io hosting messes up the WebVR experience)

Point to gaze at rocket, hold gaze for a second to fire.

This is a VR game, so stand up, point around wildly in your room, and shoot!

In browser: drag view to point at rocket, and click to fire.


Watch out! They shoot the moon!
Aww man! Moon 'sploded
